title: Pandora 's advertising revenue 2006 to 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Jan to Dec 2017 and lowest at Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007.
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 1071.68.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 1074.93 is found at Month Jan to Dec 2017 and the minimum is found at Feb 2006 to Jan 2007 where Month is 3.25.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Jan to Dec 2017 and lowest at Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007.
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 1071.68.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 1074.93 is found at Month Jan to Dec 2017 and the minimum is found at Feb 2006 to Jan 2007 where Month is 3.25.
Second maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars is found at Month Jan to Dec 2016.
Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007 has 330.75 times less Revenue in million U.S. dollars than Month Jan to Dec 2017 which is the highest.
Month Jan to Dec 2017 is higher than any other Months with value 1074.93, followed by Jan to Dec 2016, and Jan to Dec 2015. Down to Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007 with the lowest value 3.25.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has declined over the Months.
The Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007 tends to be 2.52 percent lower than average.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 5121.88 if we add up values of all Months.
